title: 820-01521 no sound by speaker.
message:
Got this one. It was badly damaged by water. Repaired main lines now everything is working fine except sound. 

Things that already tried: 

U6400 reballed and after replaced
new sound board  from working macbook air and not working too, (flex also had been changed). 


I dont know what can i check now?

title: 820-01521 no sound by speaker.
message:
Is the audio codec recognized in System Report?
Possibly corroded traces, small coils, or resistors.
Headphones not working too?

title: 820-01521 no sound by speaker.
message: headphone is working and audio codec is recognized ( up and down volume normally and sound bar is working but no sound from speakers)

title: 820-01521 no sound by speaker.
message:
Volume bar available on speakers only?
In such case, try other speakers.
You can check speakers continuity directly on the MLB connector; 4-8 ohms usually.
